




























Cross-Save
Share save data between the PlayStation{Registered}4 system and PlayStation{Registered}Vita system.
Cross-Save
Share save data between the PlayStation{Registered}4 system and PlayStation{Registered}Vita system.{NEWLINE}To share data, both systems must be signed into the same Sony Entertainment{NEWLINE}Network account.
Syncing Save Data
Send save data to sync to the cloud server using {Button R1} (when there are{NEWLINE}open slots). From now on, when you connect to the cloud server, the synced data{NEWLINE}will be updated to the data with the longest playing time, unless the sync is{NEWLINE}deactivated with {Button R2} (all older data will be overwritten).
*Synced save data can be identified with the {Direcional Left+Right} icon.
Warning
If there is save data on the cloud server that is not synced to a system when it connects,{NEWLINE}all such data will be automatically copied and synced to the system as{NEWLINE}new data. Please keep this in mind when managing the system’s local save capacity.
Connecting to cloud server to sync save data.
All synced save data will be updated to the data with{NEWLINE}the longest playing time (all older data will be overwritten).
Proceed?
{Button R1} Yes (proceed to Cross-Save screen)
{Button L2} No (return to title screen)
{Button R1} Send/Sync save data
{Button R2} Delete cloud save/Deactivate sync
{Button L2} Cancel/Quit
Sending Save Data {VAR05:30} to cloud server for sync.
From now on, when you connect to the cloud server,{NEWLINE}the synced data will be updated to the data with{NEWLINE}the longest playing time, unless the sync is deactivated{NEWLINE}with {Button R2} (all older data will be overwritten).
Proceed?
{Button R1} Yes
{Button L2} No
Quit Cross-Save?
The next time you connect to the cloud server, {NEWLINE}any save data on the cloud server that is not synced{NEWLINE}to your system will be automatically copied and synced{NEWLINE}to the system as new data.{NEWLINE}Please keep this in mind when managing the system's{NEWLINE}local save capacity.
Please keep this in mind when managing the system's local save capacity.
{Button R1} Yes
{Button L2} No

A network error has occurred. Please try again later.{NEWLINE}If you are signed in to PSN{xF1}  from{NEWLINE}another system, please sign out before trying again.
Trophy Information
Share game trophy information between PlayStation{Registered}3 and PlayStation{Registered}Vita.{NEWLINE}To share trophy information, both systems must be  signed into the same PlayStation{Registered}Network account.
Loading
{Button L2} Cancel
Data transfer error!
{Button R1} Confirm

Failed to sync to cloud server.
Connect to PlayStation{Registered}Network.
A network error has occurred.
Internet connection has been lost. {NEWLINE}Aborting Cross-Save.
Reconnecting.
The maximum limit for cloud saves has{NEWLINE}been reached.
Cross-save has been aborted due to insufficient free space in local storage.{NEWLINE}At least {VAR05:30} MB more free space is needed to perform a cross-save.  
Cross-Save has been aborted because the maximum{NEWLINE}limit for local saves has been reached.{NEWLINE}At least {VAR05:30} FFX-2 local save(s) must be{NEWLINE}deleted to perform a Cross-Save.
Cross-Save has been aborted because the maximum{NEWLINE}limit for local saves has been reached.{NEWLINE}At least {VAR05:30} FFX-2 LM local save(s) must be{NEWLINE}deleted to perform a Cross-Save.
Cross-Save is not available due to parental{NEWLINE}control restrictions on the Sony Entertainment Network{NEWLINE}account.
{VAR05:30} cloud save(s) from another region exist on{NEWLINE}the cloud server. These saves cannot be used with{NEWLINE}the current game version. Please use versions{NEWLINE}that correctly correspond to each region.
You have signed out of PSN{xF1}.{NEWLINE}You must be signed in to use the Cross-Save function.{NEWLINE}Aborting Cross-Save.
Load complete
Proceed
An error has occurred while accessing the Internet. {NEWLINE}Aborting Cross-Save.
